project.name: cola.js
project.description: Javascript constraint based layout for high-quality graph visualization and exploration using D3.js and other web-based graphics libraries.

classitems.description:
the list of nodes.
If nodes has not been set, but links has, then we instantiate a nodes list here, of the correct size,
before returning it.
classitems.name: nodes

classitems.description: a list of hierarchical groups defined over nodes
classitems.name: groups

classitems.description: if true, the layout will not permit overlaps of the node bounding boxes (defined by the width and height properties on nodes)
classitems.name: avoidOverlaps

classitems.description: if true, the layout will not permit overlaps of the node bounding boxes (defined by the width and height properties on nodes)
classitems.name: avoidOverlaps

classitems.description:
causes constraints to be generated such that directed graphs are laid out either from left-to-right or top-to-bottom.
a separation constraint is generated in the selected axis for each edge that is not involved in a cycle (part of a strongly connected component)

params.name: minSeparation
params.description: either a number specifying a minimum spacing required across all links or a function to return the minimum spacing for each link

classitems.description: links defined as source, target pairs over nodes
classitems.name: links

classitems.description: list of constraints of various types
classitems.name: constraints

classitems.description:
Matrix of ideal distances between all pairs of nodes.
If unspecified, the ideal distances for pairs of nodes will be based on the shortest path distance between them.
classitems.name: distanceMatrix

classitems.description:
Size of the layout canvas dimensions [x,y]. Currently only used to determine the midpoint which is taken as the starting position
for nodes with no preassigned x and y.
classitems.name: size

classitems.description: Default size (assume nodes are square so both width and height) to use in packing if node width/height are not specified.
classitems.name: defaultNodeSize

params.name: initialUserConstraintIterations
params.description: initial layout iterations with user-specified constraints

params.name: initialAllConstraintsIterations
params.description: initial layout iterations with all constraints including non-overlap

warnings.message:
Missing item type
causes constraints to be generated such that directed graphs are laid out either from left-to-right or top-to-bottom.
a separation constraint is generated in the selected axis for each edge that is not involved in a cycle (part of a strongly connected component)
